00010 #ifndef _ADAPTERFACTOYCONTAINER_H__
00011 #define _ADAPTERFACTOYCONTAINER_H__
00012 
00013 #include "IAdapterFactory.h"
00014 #include <vector>
00015 #include "platform/hash_map.h"
00016 #include "stlutils.h"
00017 
00019 
00020 class AdapterFactoyContainer
00021 {
00022 public:
00024     ~AdapterFactoyContainer()
00025     {
00026         for(size_t i = 0; i != mFactories.size(); ++i)
00027             mFactories[i]->Release();
00028     }
00029 
00031     void AddFactory(IAdapterFactory *pFactory)
00032     {
00033         pFactory->AddRef();
00034         mFactories.push_back(pFactory);
00035 
00036         module::guid** ppGuid = pFactory->DestInterfaceList();
00037         while(*ppGuid)
00038         {
00040             if(mAdatperFactoryMap.find(**ppGuid) == mAdatperFactoryMap.end())
00041                 mAdatperFactoryMap.insert(std::make_pair(**ppGuid, pFactory));
00042             else
00043                 assert(false);
00044 
00045             ++ppGuid;
00046         }
00047     }
00048 
00050     module::HResult CreateAdapter(module::IUnknown* object, SF_RIID uid, void **ppAdapter)
00051     {
00052         TAdapterFactoryMap::const_iterator it =
00053                 mAdatperFactoryMap.find(uid);
00054 
00055         if(it == mAdatperFactoryMap.end())
00056             return SF_E_NOINTERFACE;
00057 
00058         return it->second->GetAdapter(object, uid, ppAdapter);
00059     }
00060 
00061 protected:
00062     typedef std::hash_map<module::guid, IAdapterFactory*, module::guid_hash> TAdapterFactoryMap;
00063 
00064     TAdapterFactoryMap                          mAdatperFactoryMap;
00065 
00066     std::vector<IAdapterFactory*>       mFactories;
00067 };
00068 
00069 #endif // _ADAPTERFACTOYCONTAINER_H__
